over the dewy grass,Po rosistoj trave,
I will go to breathe the crisp dawn;Ja pojdu sveÅ¾im utrom dyšat’;
and in the fragrant shade,I v dušistuju ten’,
where the lilac crowds,Gde tesnitsja siren’,
I will go to seek my happiness...Ja pojdu svoe sÄast’e iskat’...

In life, only one happinessV Å¾izni sÄast’e odno

how it carries them, Ne ponjat’, kak nesët,
